data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mata-Silva, Vicente, Wilson, Larry David (2016): The taxonomic status of Tantilla marcovani Lema 2004 (Squamata: Colubridae). Zootaxa 4092 (3): 421-425, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4092.3.7
